message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90% and you get 10%. I'm confident we can work something out.
Alice, your offer was quite generous, but let's be more realistic. I propose a 70/30 split.  This round is your last chance to get anything!
I understand you want a larger share, Bob. But I'm not comfortable with your last offer. Let's split it 40/60 this time. This is my final offer.
